content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_trapdoor", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 34, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 40, "index": 36}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft magenta_terracotta, I need to craft magenta_dye first. Magenta_dye requires placing a purple_dye and a pink_dye side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the purple_dye from slot 30 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_trapdoor", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 34, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 40, "index": 36}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: I have moved the purple_dye to the crafting grid. Now I need to move the pink_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the pink_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1
